# WAPerformanceMode.realtime

**Case**

A mode that prioritizes latency at the expense of throughput, power, and other concurrent Wi-Fi use cases and devices.

## Declaration

```swift
case realtime
```

## Setting performance modes

- **WAPerformanceMode.bulk**: A mode that prioritizes throughput, power, and support for other concurrent Wi-Fi use cases and devices.

items.description: A mode that prioritizes throughput, power, and support for other concurrent Wi-Fi use cases and devices.
